content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0) supplying raw materials.
- Furnace 1 at position (0.0, 0.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Furnace 2 at position (2.0, 0.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

(Note: The logs provided do not indicate any new errors or mistakes made by the agent in the recent steps. The error tips section remains unchanged from the previous report.)
